text: Cyber Risk Analysts and CISOs align security initiatives with enterprise risk strategy. Their responsibilities include risk quantification, regulatory reporting, board-level communication, and security policy enforcement. They lead or influence GRC, AppSec, cloud, and detection teams. Their tone is strategic, outcome-driven, and business-aligned. They prefer executive summaries, heat maps, and visual risk dashboards.

metadata.description: Focuses on aligning cybersecurity with business goals. Oversees risk management, policy enforcement, security investments, and executive reporting.
